data.system_settings: Samsung's Galaxy J7 Sky Pro Android 6.0.1
data.expected_result: Audit log option shows in settings
data.short_description: Audit logs don't show up in servers you don't own yet have perms to view them
data.steps_to_repro: - Go to a server you're not owner in but have view audit log perms - Open settings and the audit log option doesn't show
